actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission Act

summary.text: San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission Act - Establishes the San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission to determine the boundaries and interests in land of such Grant in New Mexico. Specifies the composition of such Commission. Provides for the appointment of a staff for such Commission. Authorizes such Commission to hold hearings. Requires such Commission to report to the President and Congress within four years with findings and recommendations concerning such Grant.

titles.title: San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission Act
A bill to establish the San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission, and for other purposes.
